title: Manchester United and Liverpool set for summer transfer tug of war over Bordeaux striker Malcom
text:
Malcom in the middle Manchester United and Liverpool set for summer transfer tug of war over Bordeaux striker Malcom 
The 19-year-old Brazilian has been scouted by both sides but is under contract in Ligue 1 until 2020 Gossip Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments MALCOM is set to be in the middle of a summer transfer tug of war between Manchester United and Liverpool. 
The Bordeaux striker, 19, has been scouted by both teams but is under contract in Ligue 1 until 2020. Getty Images 3 Malcom says he wants to play in the Champions League and has caught the eye of Man United and Liverpool 
That is not likely to deter the two Premier League powerhouses, though, as both look to bolster their front lines for next year. 
However, there could be a spanner in the works as Brazilian Malcom, who started his career at Corinthians, has made clear he wants to compete in the Champions League next season. 
That is currently beyond United as they STILL sit sixth in the table despite Saturday’s 2-0 win over Watford , with Liverpool a point ahead in the crucial fourth spot. Getty Images The 19-year-old Brazilian has scored four times for in-form Bordeaux this season Getty Images 3 Malcom is under contract in Ligue 1 till 2020 but could be on his way to the Premier League 
He is unlikely to say you’re not the boss of me, now, to either Jose Mourinho or Jurgen Klopp should they come calling, however. 
And both sides must think it is more a case of yes, no, maybe, than I don’t know when it comes to signing him. 
That is because club scouts from both sides were in attendance at the Stade Matmut Atlantique on Friday, according to ClubCall . Malcom started in the 3-0 defeat to Paris Saint-Germain but failed to score. He has netted four times so far this season and helped his side to seventh in the table. 
After the game, Malcom, named after American civil rights activist Malcolm X, said: "For me, it's not important which club and which championship I am in. 
"I want to play for a big club, in the Champions League, and win it."
